name: grav
description: Grav is a flat-file CMS that allows users to build websites without a database. It supports themes, plugins, markdown content, and runs extremely fast, suitable for blogs, documentation sites, or landing pages.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Build websites without database dependencies using markdown and YAML files

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Exceptional speed with built-in caching and optimized file-based content delivery

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Choose from hundreds of responsive themes or create custom designs

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for forms, SEO, e-commerce, and more

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Store entire site in Git for easy deployment and collaboration
